attack.description: Specify the attack modes. (Run module with extra_flag -h to see them)

publickey.description: Public rsa key to crack. You can import multiple public keys with wildcards.

uncipher.description: Uncipher a cipher, using commas to separate multiple ciphers

uncipherfile.description: Uncipher a file, using commas to separate multiple paths.

n.description: Specify the modulus. format : int or 0xhex.

p.description: Specify the first prime number. format : int or 0xhex

q.description: Specify the second prime number. format : int or 0xhex

e.description: Specify the public exponent, using commas to separate multiple exponents. format : int or 0xhex

extra_flags.description:
Add your own flags.
For example, '--sendtofdb --check_publickey'
